trans-unit.source: All images except the flags included in this repository were created by the team, and are included in the GPL license. The SVGs were all created in Inkscape.
trans-unit.target: 除旗帜外,本资源库中的所有图片均由团队创建,并包含在 GPL 许可中。SVG 都是在 Inkscape 中创建的。

trans-unit.source: All of the non-code contributors are listed in CONTRIBUTORS.rst
trans-unit.target: 所有非代码贡献者都列在 CONTRIBUTORS.rst中

trans-unit.source: Assuming root is going to be running the script:
Canonical URL for this site. Used for setting the rel=canonical link in the web site, as well as generating the robots.txt and sitemap.xml
trans-unit.target: 本网站的标准URL。用于设置网站中的rel=canonical链接,以及生成robots.txt和sitemap.xml。

trans-unit.source: Clan ID from Clash Royale. If it starts with a ‘#’, clan ID must be quoted.
trans-unit.target: Clash Royale的氏族ID。如果以“＃”开头，​​则必须引用氏族ID。

trans-unit.source: Create /root/.crtools file as specified above, and add your API key (from https://developer.clashroyale.com), output path (the document root), and clan tag
trans-unit.target: 如上所述创建 /root/.crtools 文件，并添加您的API密钥（来自https://developer.clashroyale.com），输出路径（文档根目录）和clan标记

trans-unit.source: Create the following entry in your crontab:
trans-unit.target: 在您的crontab中创建以下条目。

trans-unit.source: Crtools currently supports the following languages:

trans-unit.target: 查找您的文档根目录（例如 /var/www/html ）

trans-unit.source: For an example dashboard created for the clan Agrassar (#JY8YVV), see: https://agrassar.com/
trans-unit.target: 有关为Agrassar（＃JY8YVV）氏族创建的示例仪表板，请参阅：https ://agrassar.com/
有关更多详细信息，请参见samples / crtools.ini。

trans-unit.source: If you have an older version installed, to upgrade to the latest version, run:
trans-unit.target: 如果您安装的是旧版本,要升级到最新版本,请运行。

trans-unit.source: If you have problems, you can manually install the fan kit. See Fan Kit Manual Install Instructions
trans-unit.target: 如果有问题，可以手动安装风扇套件。请参阅 风扇套件手册安装说明

trans-unit.source: If you need help getting this up and running, feel free to hop on the crtools discord.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要帮助来启动和运行它，请随时跳过 crtools discord。

trans-unit.source: If you wish for crtools to be available in another languages, reach out to me. I’m unable to do the translation myself (I speak only English), but I can help you provide a translation for this.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望使用其他语言的crtools，请与我联系。我无法自己翻译（我只会说英语），但是我可以帮助您提供翻译。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to use a language other than English, add the following switch on the command line:
trans-unit.target: 如果您想使用英语以外的其他语言，请在命令行上添加以下开关：
通过pip安装这个应用程序

trans-unit.source: It was important to us to make sure the entirety of this application is open source, and not subject to takedown request. We will not ever extract assets from the game or from any other web properties.
trans-unit.target: 对我们来说,重要的是要确保这个应用程序的全部内容都是开源的,并且不受取缔请求。我们永远不会从游戏或任何其他网络属性中提取资产。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind, this is a command-line utility that expects a working Python 3 environment. It also assumes you will know how to configure a web server to serve up HTML, as well as cron or similar on your given platform. There is no install wizard, GUI of any kind, etc.
trans-unit.target: 请记住,这是一个命令行实用程序,需要在Python 3环境下工作。它还假定你知道如何配置一个 web 服务器来提供 HTML,以及在你给定的平台上配置 cron 或类似的功能。没有安装向导,也没有任何形式的图形用户界面等。

trans-unit.source: Locale if language other than English is desired (see Other languages/locales).
trans-unit.target: 语言环境，如果需要英语以外的其他语言（请参见其他语言/语言环境）。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: This requires about 5GB free in your temp forlder on the machine that crtools runs on. It will take 10-15 minutes to download and extract, but only the first time you run with the fankit enabled.
trans-unit.target: 注意:这需要在您的临时文件夹中,在crtools运行的机器上有大约5GB的可用空间。下载和解压需要 10-15 分钟,但只是第一次运行时启用 fankit。

trans-unit.source: Once you have created a key that you can use for this purpose, find the sheet ID from your spreadsheet URL, add the following to your config file:
trans-unit.target: 一旦你创建了一个可以用于此目的的密钥,从你的电子表格URL中找到工作表ID,在你的配置文件中添加以下内容。

trans-unit.source: Optional blacklist and vacation management using Google Sheets
trans-unit.target: 可选择使用Google Sheets进行黑名单和假期管理

trans-unit.source: Optionally, crtools can download the official Clash Royale fan kit and use some of the content contained. This is not the default behavior, and no works copywritten by Supercell are contained within this code.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择,crtools可以下载官方的Clash Royale粉丝包,并使用其中的部分内容。这不是默认的行为,而且本代码中不包含Supercell抄袭的作品。

trans-unit.source: Python tools for creating a clan management dashboard for Clash Royale
trans-unit.target: 用于创建Clash Royale家族管理仪表板的Python工具。

trans-unit.source: Source path for clan logo PNG. Recommended at least 64x64 pizels. If provided, we will copy to the output directory.
trans-unit.target: 族徽PNG的源路径。建议至少64x64 pizels。如果提供,我们将复制到输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Source path for favicon.ico. If provided, we will copy to the output directory.
trans-unit.target: favicon.ico的源路径。如果提供,我们将复制到输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Source path snippet of HTML to replace the clan description. Should not be a complete HTML document. Sample here: https://github.com/AaronTraas/crtools-agrassar-assets/blob/master/description.html If provided, we will copy to the output directory.
trans-unit.target: HTML的源路径片段以替换氏族描述。不应是完整的HTML文档。此处的示例：https : //github.com/AaronTraas/crtools-agrassar-assets/blob/master/description.html（如果提供），我们将复制到输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Suggested usage on a Linux web server
trans-unit.target: 建议在Linux网络服务器上使用

trans-unit.source: The above example is French. Use the locale code listed above
trans-unit.target: 上面的例子是法语。使用上面列出的地区代码

trans-unit.source: The design of this site is optionally enhanced by the fan kit provided by Supercell here. To enable automated downloading of the fan kit, add:
trans-unit.target: 本网站的设计可以选择使用Supercell提供的风扇套件。为了实现自动下载风扇套件,请添加。

trans-unit.source: The flags included are from http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/flags/, which as of 5/27/2019 stated it required no attribution or license. We are interpreting this to mean these are available in the public domain.
trans-unit.target: 包含的标志来自http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/flags/，截至2019年5月27日，该标志要求没有署名或许可。我们将其解释为意味着它们可以在公共领域使用。

trans-unit.source: Then you will have to go to the Google Developer API library page, and enable the Google Sheets library for your account.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您将必须转到Google Developer API库页面，并为您的帐户启用Google表格库。

trans-unit.source: This content is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by Supercell and Supercell is not responsible for it. For more information see Supercell’s Fan Content Policy: https://supercell.com/en/fan-content-policy/
trans-unit.target: 该内容不属于Supercell的隶属，认可，赞助或特别批准，Supercell对此不承担任何责任。有关更多信息，请参阅Supercell的粉丝内容政策：https : //supercell.com/en/fan-content-policy/

trans-unit.source: This is a tool for creating a dashboard for clan participation in ClashRoyale. See https://developer.clashroyale.com to sign up for a developer account and create an API key to use with this.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个用于创建战队参与ClashRoyale的仪表板的工具。请参阅https://developer.clashroyale.com来注册开发人员帐户并创建一个与此相关的API密钥。

trans-unit.source: This is an INI file. As of current version, there’s only one possible parameter: api_key. The file should look like:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个INI文件。从当前版本开始，只有一个可能的参数：api_key。该文件应如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This project uses SonarQube for static analysis. The results of analysis are at SonarCloud. The code quality and test coverage are a work in progress.
trans-unit.target: 该项目使用SonarQube进行静态分析。分析结果在SonarCloud上。代码质量和测试范围仍在进行中。

trans-unit.source: This requires Python 3 and pip on your machine. To install, use
trans-unit.target: 这需要Python 3和你的机器上的pip。要安装,使用

trans-unit.source: This tool is a static site generator – it generates static HTML, JavaScript, and CSS used to render the dashboard. If you wish to use this, you should set it up to run once per hour on your web server using cron or similar. Below is an example setup on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 该工具是静态网站生成器-它生成用于呈现仪表板的静态HTML，JavaScript和CSS。如果希望使用此功能，则应使用 cron 或类似工具将其设置为每小时在Web服务器上运行一次。以下是Linux上的示例设置。

trans-unit.source: This tool is a static site generator – it generates static HTML, JavaScript, and CSS used to render the dashboard. If you wish to use this, you should set it up to run once per hour on your web server.
trans-unit.target: 该工具是静态网站生成器-它生成用于呈现仪表板的静态HTML，JavaScript和CSS。如果希望使用此功能，则应将其设置为每小时在Web服务器上运行一次。

trans-unit.source: To the [Paths] section of your config file.
trans-unit.target: 到配置文件的 [Paths] 部分。

trans-unit.source: Using the ClashRoyale Official Fan Kit

You can optionally use a Google Sheets log to keep track of demerits and vacations. If you want that info to be integrated with crtools, you need to copy the crtools member log template to your Google Docs account and use that. Fill in with info about your clan. Be sure not to re-name any of the tabs, or add/remove any columns.
trans-unit.target: 您可以选择使用Google表格日志来记录欠款和休假情况。如果您希望该信息与crtools集成，则需要将crtools成员日志模板复制 到您的Google Docs帐户并使用它。填写有关您的氏族的信息。确保不要重命名任何选项卡，也不要添加/删除任何列。

trans-unit.source: You will also need to sign up for a Google Cloud API key.
trans-unit.target: 您还需要注册一个Google Cloud API密钥。

trans-unit.source: You will then need to go the the Google credential management page, edit the API key you created, giving it access to the Sheets API.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您需要转到Google凭据管理页面，编辑您创建的API密钥，使其可以访问Sheets API。
此应用程序的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: crtools - Clash Royale Clan Dashboard generator
crtools looks for a config file in your home directory called .crtools
trans-unit.target: crtools会在你的主目录下寻找一个名为.crtools的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: show this help message and exit
trans-unit.target: 显示此帮助信息并退出
